#summary &ntilde character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesN

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesN N] > &ntilde

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ntilde;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d1/index.htm U+000D1].
  * `&Ntilde` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d1/index.htm U+000D1].
  * `&ntilde;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f1/index.htm U+000F1].
  * `&ntilde` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f1/index.htm U+000F1].
